html:
26 Mar 2025

What’s the story behind the story? What inspired you to write House of Stars (The Twelve Houses Book 1)?

My love for astrology inspired me to create a world that is based on the elements of astrology.

If you had to pick theme songs for the main characters of House of Stars (The Twelve Houses Book 1), what would they be?

“I still haven’t found what I’m looking for” by U2.

What’s your favorite genre to read? Is it the same as your favorite genre to write?

Fantasy is my favorite genre to read and write in.

What books are on your TBR pile right now?

Spark of the Everflame, Onyx Storm.

What scene in your book was your favorite to write?

The climax.

Do you have any quirky writing habits? (lucky mugs, cats on laps, etc.)

I write in my journal with a pencil and eraser first before transcribing onto my laptop computer.

Do you have a motto, quote, or philosophy you live by?

Anything is possible if you believe.

If you could choose one thing for readers to remember after reading your book, what would it be?

You belong in my world.
